import React from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; const AuthorsCard = ({ authors }) => { const { id, name, avatar, email, username, website, bio, articlesCount, } = authors[0]; return (
Author:

{name}
@{username}
 {email}
{website}

"{bio}"

Articles: {articlesCount}
); }; export default AuthorsCard;
